quickSteps: Open the XMR→ETH pair and choose the ETH network (e.g., mainnet); see friendly coin pages at /en/coins/xmr and /en/coins/eth.
Load a quote: Fixed for an exact ETH out-amount; Floating for live pricing with small variance.
Prepare a fresh ETH receiving address and verify the first/last characters.
Sanity-check address, ETH network, and the quote timer; for larger amounts consider 2–3 parts.
Send XMR within the quote window and verify the expected ETH amount after wallet sync.

seo.title: XMR to ETH: Simple Reasons and a Calm, Repeatable Swap
seo.description: A practical XMR→ETH guide with clear reasons, unique 5-step swap checklist, and absolute URLs for crawlers.
